name: 🚀 Safe Deploy
description: One-click safe deploy agent. Runs safeguard, auto-deploy, logs, and echoes final URL.
script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail
source ./scripts/deploy_utils.sh

REPO_NAME=$(basename $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel))

ensure_start_script
finalize_deploy "$REPO_NAME"
